sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Dashboard.css'; const Dashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const [user] = useState({ name: 'Demo User', email: 'demo@example.com', role: location.state?.role || 'creator', bio: 'This is a demo user profile.', stats: { followers: 12500, engagementRate: 3.2, totalEarnings: 15750, activeDeals: 3 } }); // Redirect to sign in if no role is provided useEffect(() => { if (!location.state?.role) { navigate('/signin'); } }, [location.state, navigate]); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [notifications, setNotifications] = useState([]); const [settingsData, setSettingsData] = useState({ profile: { name: 'Demo User', email: 'demo@example.com', bio: 'This is a demo user profile.', avatar: null, phone: '+1 (555) 123-4567', location: 'New York, NY', website: 'https://example.com' }, account: { username: 'demo_user', language: 'en', timezone: 'America/New_York', currency: 'USD' }, notifications: { email: true, push: true, sms: false, deals: true, messages: true, payments: true, marketing: false }, security: { twoFactor: false, loginAlerts: true, sessionTimeout: 30 }, billing: { plan: 'Pro', nextBilling: '2024-02-15', paymentMethod: 'Visa ending in 4242', autoRenew: true } }); const handleLogout = () => { navigate('/signin'); }; // Button handlers for overview actions const handleActionButton = (action, role) => { switch (action) { case 'browse-deals': setActiveTab('marketplace'); break; case 'update-profile': setActiveTab('profile'); break; case 'create-deal': setActiveTab('marketplace'); break; case 'view-analytics': setActiveTab('analytics'); break; case 'browse-offers': setActiveTab('marketplace'); break; case 'add-creator': setActiveTab('creators'); break; default: console.log(`Action: ${action} for role: ${role}`); } }; const handleDealAction = (dealId, action) => { console.log(`${action} deal: ${dealId}`); // Add notification const newNotification = { id: Date.now(), type: 'success', message: `Deal ${action} successfully`, timestamp: new Date() }; setNotifications(prev => [...prev, newNotification]); // Remove notification after 3 seconds setTimeout(() => { setNotifications(prev => prev.filter(n => n.id !== newNotification.id)); }, 3000); }; const handleApplicationAction = (applicationId, action) => { console.log(`${action} application: ${applicationId}`); const newNotification = { id: Date.now(), type: 'success', message: `Application ${action} successfully`, timestamp: new Date() }; setNotifications(prev => [...prev, newNotification]); setTimeout(() => { setNotifications(prev => prev.filter(n => n.id !== newNotification.id)); }, 3000); }; const handleOfferAction = (offerId, action) => { console.log(`${action} offer: ${offerId}`); const newNotification = { id: Date.now(), type: 'success', message: `Offer ${action} successfully`, timestamp: new Date() }; setNotifications(prev => [...prev, newNotification]); setTimeout(() => { setNotifications(prev => prev.filter(n => n.id !== newNotification.id)); }, 3000); }; const handleViewAll = (section) => { console.log(`View all ${section}`); // Navigate to the appropriate section switch (section) { case 'activity': setActiveTab('analytics'); break; case 'creators': setActiveTab('creators'); break; case 'offers': setActiveTab('marketplace'); break; default: console.log(`View all ${section}`); } }; const handleTimeFilterChange = (timeframe) => { console.log(`Time filter changed to: ${timeframe}`); // Here you would typically update the chart data based on the selected timeframe }; // Role-specific menu items const getMenuItems = () => { switch (user.role) { case 'agency': return [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: '📊', description: 'Snapshot: earnings, top creators, recent activity' }, { id: 'marketplace', label: 'Marketplace', icon: '🏪', description: 'Browse offers, assign to creators, manage deals' }, { id: 'creators', label: 'Creators', icon: '👥', description: 'Manage and monitor linked creators' }, { id: 'analytics', label: 'Analytics', icon: '📈', description: 'Deep metrics: top creators, campaign ROI, revenue trends' }, { id: 'messages', label: 'Messages', icon: '💬', description: 'DM with creators & brands' }, { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', icon: '⚙️', description: 'Agency info, billing, permissions' } ]; case 'brand': return [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: '📊', description: 'Quick stats: spend, conversions, deal status' }, { id: 'marketplace', label: 'Marketplace', icon: '🏪', description: 'Create deals, manage campaigns, track offers' }, { id: 'creators', label: 'Creators', icon: '👥', description: 'View applicants and selected creators' }, { id: 'analytics', label: 'Analytics', icon: '📈', description: 'Breakdown by creator, campaign, cost per result' }, { id: 'messages', label: 'Messages', icon: '💬', description: 'Direct communication with creators' }, { id: 'billing', label: 'Billing', icon: '💳', description: 'Add funds, invoices, transaction history' }, { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', icon: '⚙️', description: 'Brand profile, team roles, preferences' } ]; case 'creator': default: return [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: '📊', description: 'High-level: earnings, active deals, growth' }, { id: 'marketplace', label: 'Marketplace', icon: '🏪', description: 'Browse brand offers, apply or auto-accept, track deadlines' }, { id: 'profile', label: 'Profile', icon: '👤', description: 'Update niche, audience stats, linked accounts' }, { id: 'analytics', label: 'Analytics', icon: '📈', description: 'Personal performance: impressions, clicks, income trends' }, { id: 'messages', label: 'Messages', icon: '💬', description: 'DM with brands / agencies' }, { id: 'payouts', label: 'Payouts', icon: '💰', description: 'Pending + completed payments' }, { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', icon: '⚙️', description: 'Account info, notifications, logout' } ]; } }; const menuItems = getMenuItems(); const renderCreatorOverview = () => (

Creator Overview

Track your growth, earnings, and upcoming opportunities

💰 +12.5%
${user.stats.totalEarnings.toLocaleString()} Total Earnings
👥 +8.2%
{user.stats.followers.toLocaleString()} Followers
📈 +0.3%
{user.stats.engagementRate}% Engagement Rate
🤝 0
{user.stats.activeDeals} Active Deals

Earnings Trend

Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat

Active Deals

{user.stats.activeDeals} deals

Summer Collection Campaign

Fashion Brand Co. • $2,500

75% complete

Gadget World • $1,800

); const renderOverview = () => { switch (user.role) { case 'creator': return renderCreatorOverview(); case 'brand': return renderBrandOverview(); case 'agency': return renderAgencyOverview(); default: return renderCreatorOverview(); } }; const handleSettingsSave = (section, data) => { setSettingsData(prev => ({ ...prev, [section]: { ...prev[section], ...data } })); const newNotification = { id: Date.now(), type: 'success', message: `${section.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + section.slice(1)} settings updated successfully`, timestamp: new Date() }; setNotifications(prev => [...prev, newNotification]); setTimeout(() => { setNotifications(prev => prev.filter(n => n.id !== newNotification.id)); }, 3000); }; const handleFileUpload = (file) => { // Simulate file upload const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = (e) => { setSettingsData(prev => ({ ...prev, profile: { ...prev.profile, avatar: e.target.result } })); }; reader.readAsDataURL(file); }; const handleDeleteAccount = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.')) { console.log('Account deletion requested'); navigate('/signin'); } }; const renderSettings = () => { const [activeSettingsTab, setActiveSettingsTab] = useState('profile'); const getSettingsTabs = () => { const baseTabs = [ { id: 'profile', label: 'Profile', icon: '👤' }, { id: 'account', label: 'Account', icon: '⚙️' }, { id: 'notifications', label: 'Notifications', icon: '🔔' }, { id: 'security', label: 'Security', icon: '🔒' } ]; if (user.role === 'brand' || user.role === 'agency') { baseTabs.push({ id: 'billing', label: 'Billing', icon: '💳' }); } return baseTabs; }; const renderProfileSettings = () => (

Profile Settings

Update your personal information and profile details

{settingsData.profile.avatar ? ( ) : (
{settingsData.profile.name.split(' ').map(n => n[0]).join('')}
)}
setSettingsData(prev => ({ ...prev, profile: { ...prev.profile, name: e.target.value } }))} placeholder="Enter your full name" />
setSettingsData(prev => ({ ...prev, profile: { ...prev.profile, email: e.target.value } }))} placeholder="Enter your email" />
setSettingsData(prev => ({ ...prev, profile: { ...prev.profile, phone: e.target.value } }))} placeholder="Enter your phone number" />
setSettingsData(prev => ({ ...prev, profile: { ...prev.profile, location: e.target.value } }))} placeholder="Enter your location" />
setSettingsData(prev => ({ ...prev, profile: { ...prev.profile, website: e.target.value } }))} placeholder="https://yourwebsite.com" />
